    • checkDates

      public static boolean checkDates​(java.time.LocalDateTime startDate, java.time.LocalDateTime endDate)
      Verify if the startDate is before the endDate
      Parameters:
      startDate - The startDate which will be used for verification.
      endDate - The endDate which will be used for verification.
      Returns:
